      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Vertex getLineSegmentIntersect(Vertex a, Vertex b, Vertex c)
      Given a line connecting a pair of vertices, find the point on that line that when connected to a third given point produces a line perpendicular to the first, ie, the point of line AB that is closest to point c.

    • Method Detail

      • getLineSegmentIntersect

        public static Vertex getLineSegmentIntersect(Vertex a,
                                             Vertex b,
                                             Vertex c)
        Given a line connecting a pair of vertices, find the point on that line that when connected to a third given point produces a line perpendicular to the first, ie, the point of line AB that is closest to point c.
        Parameters:
        a - First point of given line
        b - Second point of given line
        c - Point to find connectiong point for
        Returns:
        The Vertex representing the intersection point which gives the shortest line to point c
